scripts.index:search: if [ -d out ]; then npx pagefind --site out --output-path public/_pagefind; else echo 'Run npm run build first, then npm run index:search (or dev:with-search) for search in dev.'; exit 1; fi
scripts.postbuild: if [ -d out ]; then npx pagefind --site out --output-path out/_pagefind; else echo 'Skipping search index (no out/).'; fi
